SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS period, DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS periodLabel
CONCAT(YEAR(s.sold_at), '-Q', QUARTER(s.sold_at)) AS period, CONCAT(YEAR(s.sold_at), '년 ', QUARTER(s.sold_at), '분기') AS periodLabel
YEAR(s.sold_at) AS period, CONCAT(YEAR(s.sold_at), '년') AS periodLabel
DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y-%m') AS period, DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y년 %m월') AS periodLabel
, SUM(s.total_amount) AS totalAmount, COUNT(*) AS saleCount, AVG(s.total_amount) AS avgAmount FROM sales s WHERE s.use_yn = 1 AND s.status_code = 'COMPLETED' AND DATE(s.sold_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND s.branch_id = #{branchId}
GROUP BY period, periodLabel ORDER BY period ASC

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(e.expense_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS period, DATE_FORMAT(e.expense_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS periodLabel
CONCAT(YEAR(e.expense_at), '-Q', QUARTER(e.expense_at)) AS period, CONCAT(YEAR(e.expense_at), '년 ', QUARTER(e.expense_at), '분기') AS periodLabel
YEAR(e.expense_at) AS period, CONCAT(YEAR(e.expense_at), '년') AS periodLabel
DATE_FORMAT(e.expense_at, '%Y-%m') AS period, DATE_FORMAT(e.expense_at, '%Y년 %m월') AS periodLabel
, SUM(e.amount) AS totalAmount, COUNT(*) AS expenseCount, AVG(e.amount) AS avgAmount FROM expenses e WHERE e.use_yn = 1 AND e.settlement_flag = TRUE AND DATE(e.expense_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND e.branch_id = #{branchId}
GROUP BY period, periodLabel ORDER BY period ASC

WITH period_sales AS ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS period, DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS periodLabel
CONCAT(YEAR(s.sold_at), '-Q', QUARTER(s.sold_at)) AS period, CONCAT(YEAR(s.sold_at), '년 ', QUARTER(s.sold_at), '분기') AS periodLabel
YEAR(s.sold_at) AS period, CONCAT(YEAR(s.sold_at), '년') AS periodLabel
DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y-%m') AS period, DATE_FORMAT(s.sold_at, '%Y년 %m월') AS periodLabel
, s.branch_id, SUM(s.total_amount) AS salesAmount, COUNT(*) AS salesCount FROM sales s WHERE s.use_yn = 1 AND s.status_code = 'COMPLETED' AND DATE(s.sold_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND s.branch_id = #{branchId}
GROUP BY period, periodLabel, s.branch_id ), period_expenses AS ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(e.expense_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS period
CONCAT(YEAR(e.expense_at), '-Q', QUARTER(e.expense_at)) AS period
YEAR(e.expense_at) AS period
DATE_FORMAT(e.expense_at, '%Y-%m') AS period
, e.branch_id, SUM(e.amount) AS expenseAmount, COUNT(*) AS expenseCount FROM expenses e WHERE e.use_yn = 1 AND e.settlement_flag = TRUE AND DATE(e.expense_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND e.branch_id = #{branchId}
GROUP BY period, e.branch_id ) SELECT COALESCE(ps.branch_id, pe.branch_id) AS branchId, b.branch_name AS branchName, COALESCE(ps.period, pe.period) AS period, COALESCE(ps.periodLabel, pe.period) AS periodLabel, COALESCE(ps.salesAmount, 0) AS salesAmount, COALESCE(ps.salesCount, 0) AS salesCount, COALESCE(pe.expenseAmount, 0) AS expenseAmount, COALESCE(pe.expenseCount, 0) AS expenseCount, (COALESCE(ps.salesAmount, 0) - COALESCE(pe.expenseAmount, 0)) AS profitAmount, CASE WHEN (COALESCE(ps.salesAmount, 0) - COALESCE(pe.expenseAmount, 0)) > 0 THEN 'PROFIT' WHEN (COALESCE(ps.salesAmount, 0) - COALESCE(pe.expenseAmount, 0)) < 0 THEN 'LOSS' ELSE 'BREAK_EVEN' END AS profitStatus, CASE WHEN COALESCE(ps.salesAmount, 0) > 0 THEN ROUND(((COALESCE(ps.salesAmount, 0) - COALESCE(pe.expenseAmount, 0)) / ps.salesAmount * 100), 2) ELSE 0 END AS profitRate FROM period_sales ps FULL OUTER JOIN period_expenses pe ON ps.period = pe.period AND ps.branch_id = pe.branch_id LEFT JOIN branch b ON b.branch_id = COALESCE(ps.branch_id, pe.branch_id) ORDER BY period ASC
